title: BRIEF-Philippine Savings Bank's Board Approves Dividends For Q3 Of 0.75 Pesos Per Share
text:
BRIEF-Philippine Savings Bank's Board Approves Dividends For Q3 Of 0.75 Pesos Per Share

Stock Markets 42 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 09:40)

BRIEF-Philippine Savings Bank's Board Approves Dividends For Q3 Of 0.75 Pesos Per Share Oct 15 (Reuters) - Philippine Savings Bank :

* BOARD APPROVED CASH DIVIDENDS FOR Q3 OF 0.75 PESOS PER

SHARE
